i18n.title: React useRequestAnimationFrame Hook
i18n.description: In this lab, we will explore how to use the useRequestAnimationFrame hook in React to animate a function, ensuring that it runs before every repaint. This hook is useful for creating smooth and efficient animations in web applications. We will walk through the process of creating the hook and implementing it in a simple counter component that updates in real-time.

meta.title: Mastering React's useRequestAnimationFrame Hook
meta.description: Learn how to use the powerful useRequestAnimationFrame hook in React to create smooth and efficient animations in your web applications.
meta.keywords: react, userequestanimationframe, web development, hooks, animation
